name: Spirit of Uku: One Frog Can Make a Difference (Narrative Driven Jam #7)
name_original: Spirit of Uku: One Frog Can Make a Difference (Narrative Driven Jam #7)
description:
Spirit of Uku: One Frog Can Make a Difference was made for the Narrative Driven Jam #7 by Patrick Knisely (with a little help from his son, Magnus Knisely).

Through the lens of a red-eyed tree frog's life cycle, this game guides you on a meditation of planetary cycles, climate change, and the wonder that is existence on this planet.
